summary: Project focused on improving friend/name selection usability: users with many friends cannot scroll through the name list to reach desired names.
known_issues: Friends/name list cannot be scrolled up/down, preventing users from reaching names in long lists.

existing_features.title: Update the custom select dropdown used for long name lists so users can reliably reach any name by scrolling vertically (mouse wheel, trackpad, and touch drag) and by clicking/tapping explicit Up/Down arrow controls when the list overflows.

Implement the up/down arrow controls inside the scrollable Select dropdown by using the existing Radix select scroll button components already imported in ScrollableSelectContent, and ensure they are only shown when scrolling is possible in that direction.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable scrolling through the friends/name list (up/down) and/or provide up/down arrow controls to navigate long lists.

Audit all name/friend/character selection dropdowns and ensure they use the shared ScrollableSelectContent wrapper (or equivalent scroll-enabled SelectContent) so the long-list scrolling fix applies everywhere names are chosen (e.g., post author selector, comment author selector, story author selector, message sender selector).
